title: Climbing the Career Ladder
description: Career growth is not passive; it requires continuous learning, strategic visibility, and delivering consistent value. Proactively manage your career to move upwards.
sentences: Consistently upskill and reskill to stay relevant in your industry.
Find a mentor who can guide you and a sponsor who can advocate for you.
Document your accomplishments and quantifiable results regularly.
Proactively seek feedback from your manager and peers, and act on it.
Understand your company's promotion process and have open conversations about your career goals with your manager.
dos: Take on projects that stretch your abilities and have high visibility.
Build strong working relationships across different departments.
Learn how to negotiate your salary and promotions effectively.
Develop your soft skills, such as communication, leadership, and emotional intelligence.
donts: Don't assume your hard work will automatically be noticed and rewarded.
Don't shy away from difficult conversations about your career growth.
Don't burn bridges or engage in office politics.
Don't become complacent; always be looking for ways to improve.
